means: 伊索（约六世纪古希腊寓言作家，相传原为奴隶，善讲故事讽刺权贵，有<伊索寓言>传世）
An Evolutionary System for On-Line Processing 联机处理发展系统

sentence.Network_en: This fable was written after the manner of Aesop.
sentence.Network_cn: 这部寓言是仿照《伊索寓言》写成的.

sentence.Network_en: Some of Aesop's Fables are satires.
sentence.Network_cn: 《伊索寓言》中有一些是讽刺作品.

sentence.Network_en: " Aesop, move right, " Colvin says, and the robot obeys.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 伊索, 向右移动, ” 科尔文说.结果, 这架机器人就遵从命令移动.
